name: Bubble Party Rage
description:
Bubble Party Rage is a boss-rush style strategy game.

See how long you can survive as a slime in an unstable platform dodging bubbles and shooting your own.  But be careful with your shots since too many of your own could kill you!

Controls:

Default:

WASD - move

Mouse - aim

Left click - shoot

Space - dash

Escape - pause

How to edit:

normal keys: a, b, c, etc..

mouse button: 0 = left click, 1 = right click

number keys: 1, 2, 3, etc..

special keys: space, tab, backspace, etc..

Extra information:

Bubble at bottom left corner indicates you have a bubble ready to be shot!

Player blinking indicates you are ready to dash!
